mapper.insert: insert into comments ( commentNo, fk_boardNo, fk_id, fk_name, content, createdAtComment ) values ( comment_seq.NEXTVAL, #{fk_boardNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fk_id}, #{fk_name}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select commentNo, fk_boardNo, fk_id, fk_name, content, createdAtComment, updatedAtComment, parentNo from comments where fk_boardNo = #{fk_boardNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} order by commentNo desc
select count(*) from comments where fk_id = #{id} and (sysdate - createdAtComment) <= 1
